title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 206.1 - Scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 206.1 - Scope

State Regulations

The following relates to all public employment except by a
government that has adopted procedures by local law, ordinance or resolution
pursuant to section 212 of the act and with respect to which there is in effect
a determination that such provisions and procedures are substantially
equivalent to the provisions and procedures set forth in the act and in
pertinent rules with respect to the State. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4
ยง
206.1

Amended

New

York State Register August 2, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 31, eff. 8/2/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
